text: Leslie G Brown was Fijian lawn bowls international who competed in the 1950 British Empire Games. ==Bowls career== At the 1950 British Empire Games he won the bronze medal in the pairs event with James Poulton. ==References== Category:Fijian male bowls players Category:Bowls players at the 1950 British Empire Games Category:Commonwealth Games bronze medallists for Fiji Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in lawn bowls Category:Possibly living people Category:Year of birth missing
title: Leslie Brown (bowls)
